work.summary: Helped found HackFSU, Florida State's annual hackathon. In addition, was part of a small group that began development for HackFSU applications, including a website with registration and admin dashboard and the Android application that hackers used during the event.
highlights: Created original Android application with over 100 installations by attendees of the event.
Helped create and design the website for the past 3 years.
Utilized MVC architecture with an "Express.js" twist to plan, organize, and develop a web server with Node and Express.js to deliver an API for use by the HackFSU website and mobile applications.

Helped to "future-proof" the HackFSU web server/API and client-side application by utilizing good software engineering practices, including modularizing the code, refactoring, and adhering to strict coding and design guidelines.
